name: ekg-clinical-simulation
description: Clinical-grade EKG simulation with 3D heart visualization and multi-agent orchestration

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && cd apps/web && npm run build
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:heart-3d && npm run build:ekg-processor && npm run build:medical-types
scripts.build:medical-types: cd packages/medical-types && npm run build || echo 'Medical types build skipped'
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:packages || echo 'Package builds skipped during install'
